name: Windows 95 Simulator
description: Welcome to your new and fresh OS ( I always say that idk why )!This time we wanna go classic so we chose Windows Experience 95 !  Credits :As always :ali8888 and Bill Gates  Requirements:Windows 95 !Memphis/98/NT/2000/ME/Whistler/XP/Longhorn/Vista/7/8/8.1/10.And a good pc xD (I seriously don't know)  I promise it's not a horror game or a creepypasta I hate those.It belongs with the original windows parodies since 1997.So don't tell me that this is a creepypasta.
